epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.server.request

Interface AtomicAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppendRequest, DecrRequest, DelRequest, ErrRequest, GetRequest, IncrRequest, PingRequest, ReadRequest, Request, SetRequest, VoidRequest, WriteRequest

    public interface AtomicAction
    Interface that enables the request to be performed in an atomic way in the KV-store
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void performAction()
      Enables to perform an action without any synchronization
      void performAtomicAction(java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock lock)
      Enables to perform an atomic action synchronized over a specified lock

    • Method Detail

        Enables to perform an atomic action synchronized over a specified lock
        Parameters:
        lock - the lock

        void performAction()
        Enables to perform an action without any synchronization
